name: All To Get Her
description:
All To Get Her is a puzzle-platformer by vgperson about two girls and their quest for the ultimate reward.

Asha and Brooke are girls with a shared dream: to become the next Mana Goddess, the source of all magic.

However, they're also fierce rivals, always doing what they can to show each other up, never conceding to the other.

Then one fateful day, an opportunity presents itself, and Asha sneaks out to head for the Divine Dungeon...

  • Manage two characters with their own special abilities!
  • Control both girls by yourself, or work together with a friend locally!
  • Rewind time at will to easily recover if you make a mistake!
  • 70+ puzzle levels full of simple elements combined in tricky ways!
  • Story intermissions between areas! (Spoilers: it's gay)
  • Beat the game to unlock a level editor! Share custom dungeons via text!
  • Time-trial individual levels and challenge staff times!

 You can buy the soundtrack from Bandcamp.

Only local multiplayer is natively supported, but you can try the software Parsec to connect players online and play local games.
